page.title: 06Middle Sch. & Library Sheff.
page.content: Concord{Middle School}opened in 1981 is a new open plan school for children from 8-12 years. Afterwards they go on to comprehensive school. It has{251 pupils,{ 11}teachers and{8}classes. The school is one complete building including a large hall. Outside are two playgrounds and a playing field. At lunchtime{122}have school dinners, {70}people bring sandwiches and{60 people go home. As well as language and number lessons the children can play guitars and brass instruments. Rabbits and guinea pigs are kept as pets. They have 2 videos, 3 video cameras and 9 computers. The sports they play are badminton, football, sailing, swimming and netball. Part of the school is a{Community {Library.}It is used by the school and also open to the public for two days each week.
